message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation, I should get a bit more
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. This is more reasonable.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. Meet me in the middle of our two offers.
The clock is ticking, and the money keeps shrinking. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. You'll lose even more to inflation if we keep going.
Okay, you're right, I'm willing to negotiate a bit more.  This is a compromise to end this before we both lose too much.
